Candentity.name: Claudia_Rivero_(journalist)
Candentity.desc: Claudia Rivero is a Philadelphia-based journalist and reporter who has worked for various news outlets, including NBC10 and KTVK, and has received multiple awards for her work, including two Emmy awards and two Associated Press awards.

Candentity.name: Claudia_Lumor
Candentity.desc: Claudia Lumor is a Ghanaian publisher and entrepreneur who founded Glitz Africa Magazine, Glitz Style Awards, and Glitz Africa Fashion Week Ghana, serving as their executive producer.

Candentity.name: Claudia_Losch
Candentity.desc: Claudia Losch is a retired German shot putter who won the 1984 Olympic Championship and held multiple titles, including the 1989 World Indoor Championship and nine consecutive German championships.

Candentity.name: Claudia_(magazine)
Candentity.desc: Claudia is a Polish language monthly women's magazine published in Warsaw, Poland.

Candentity.name: Mikuni_Shimokawa
Candentity.desc: Mikuni Shimokawa is a Japanese pop singer and songwriter, known for her anime theme music work, particularly for the Full Metal Panic! series, and also a former member of the girl group Checkicco.

Candentity.name: Claudia_Mo
Candentity.desc: Claudia Mo, a Hong Kong journalist and politician, is a member of the pan-democracy camp who was arrested and charged with conspiracy to commit subversion under Hong Kong's National Security Law, and is currently in gaol custody pending further investigation.

Candentity.name: Claudia_Moreno
Candentity.desc: Claudia Cristina Moreno González, a Venezuelan beauty pageant titleholder, was the official representative of Venezuela to the Miss Universe 2000 pageant.

Candentity.name: Claudia_Andujar
Candentity.desc: Claudia Andujar is a Swiss-born Brazilian photographer and activist.

Candentity.name: Iron_Man_(2008_film)
Candentity.desc: Iron Man is a 2008 American superhero film directed by Jon Favreau, starring Robert Downey Jr.

Candentity.name: Iron_Man
Candentity.desc: Iron Man is a fictional superhero and a main character in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, created by Stan Lee, Larry Lieber, and Don Heck, who wears a powered exoskeleton suit to fight crime and protect the world.

Candentity.name: Peter_Parker_(Marvel_Cinematic_Universe)
Candentity.desc: Peter Parker, portrayed by Tom Holland, is a high school student with spider-like abilities who operates as a vigilante and joins the Avengers in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

Candentity.name: Iron_Man_(2009_film)
Candentity.desc: Iron Man (2009 film) is a 2009 Chinese biographical drama film directed by Li Yin, based on the life of model worker Wang Jinxi, played by Wu Gang, who won several awards for his performance.

Candentity.name: Iron_Man_(magazine)
Candentity.desc: Iron Man Magazine is a publication founded in 1936 by Peary and Mabel Rader that focuses on bodybuilding, weightlifting, and powerlifting.

Candentity.name: Iron_Man_(song)
Candentity.desc: "Iron Man" is a song by Black Sabbath, released in 1970, which tells the story of a man who time travels and becomes steel, seeking revenge on humanity after his warnings are ignored.

Candentity.name: Tony_Stark_(Marvel_Cinematic_Universe)
Candentity.desc: Tony Stark, also known as Iron Man, is a fictional character and CEO of Stark Industries who uses his genius and mechanized suits to defend the world and is a central figure in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

Candentity.name: Iron_Man_(Ultimate_Marvel_character)
Candentity.desc: Iron Man is a fictional character in the Ultimate Marvel Universe, a wealthy industrialist and genius inventor who wears a high-tech exo-suit to fight crime and has a life-threatening brain tumor, using his remaining time to become a philanthropist and superhero.

Candentity.name: The_Iron_Man_(serial)
Candentity.desc: The Iron Man is a 1924 American silent film serial directed by Jay Marchant, considered a film stub.

605.mention_context: Panorama of downtown Korla, Xinjiang in the majestic Tian Shan mountain range. May 2007.

Candentity.name: Qitian_Mountains
Candentity.desc: The Qitian Mountains, also known as the Guiyang Mountains, are a series of mountains located in Chenzhou, Hunan Province, China, and are part of the Nanling Mountains' Five Ranges.

Candentity.name: Tian_Shan
Candentity.desc: The Tian Shan, also known as the Tengri Tagh or Tengir-Too, is a large system of mountain ranges in Central Asia, stretching from the highest peak of Jengish Chokusu (7,439 meters) to the lowest point of the Turpan Depression (154 meters below sea level).

Candentity.name: Tianzhong_Mountain
Candentity.desc: Tianzhong Mountain, also known as Tiantai, is a small hill located in Runan, Henan province, covering an area of about 540 square meters and 3.

Candentity.name: Tianmen_Mountain
Candentity.desc: Tianmen Mountain is a mountain located in Zhangjiajie, Hunan Province, China, known for its unique sandstone pillars and stunning natural beauty.

Candentity.name: Tiantai_Mountain
Candentity.desc: Tiantai Mountain, also known as Mount Tiantai, is a mountain in Zhejiang, China, with a highest peak of 1,138 meters, made a national park in 1988, and home to a rare population of Seven-Son Flower.

Candentity.name: Legend_of_Tianyun_Mountain
Candentity.desc: Legend of Tianyun Mountain is a 1980 Chinese film that depicts the hardships of individuals during China's political campaigns in the 1950s and 1960s, critically reflecting on the impact of those tumultuous years.

Candentity.name: Jialishan_Range
Candentity.desc: Jialishan Range is a mountain range in northern Taiwan, with a tallest peak of 2,618m, although some scholars consider it a piedmont belt rather than a true range due to its being cut by several rivers.

Candentity.name: Tianmu_Mountain
Candentity.desc: Tianmu Mountain is a mountain in eastern China, comprising two peaks with twin ponds, known for its giant Japanese cedars, waterfalls, and diverse flora and fauna, including the last surviving truly wild population of Ginkgo trees and over 2,000 plant species.

Candentity.name: Korla
Candentity.desc: Korla is a county-level city and the seat of the Bayingolin Mongol Autonomous Prefecture in Xinjiang, China, known for its production of fragrant pears and oil fields, with a history dating back to at least the Han Dynasty.

Candentity.name: Sacred_Mountains_of_China
Candentity.desc: The Sacred Mountains of China are a group of mountains divided into three categories, including the Five Great Mountains, Four Sacred Mountains of Buddhism, and Four Sacred Mountains of Taoism, which have been important destinations for pilgrimage in Chinese history.

Candentity.name: Stockholm_County

Candentity.name: Stockholm
Candentity.desc: Stockholm is the capital and most populous urban area of Sweden, situated across 14 islands where Lake Mälaren flows into the Baltic Sea, and is a cultural, media, political, and economic centre with a rich history and numerous notable landmarks.

Candentity.name: Microsoft_SQL_Server_Master_Data_Services
Candentity.desc: Microsoft SQL Server Master Data Services is a Master Data Management product from Microsoft that helps organizations discover, define, and maintain reliable master lists of non-transactional data.
